sentences: Jef "Joseph" Maes  (5 April 1905 in Antwerp – 30 June 1996 in Antwerp) was a Belgian composer and violist.
In 1930 he was a soloist with the well-known Dierentuin concerts in Antwerp, directed by Flor Alpaerts.
Along with Gaston Ariën, J.A. Zwijsen and Steven Candael, Maes founded the Antwerpse Philharmonie (Antwerp Philharmonic Orchestra) in 1955, their first concert given on December 10, 1956.
